infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Bro needs camera access to take your profile photo.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Bro uses your location to find nearby drivers, determine your pickup location, calculate fares, and provide real-time ride tracking for navigation and safety.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Bro uses your location to find nearby drivers, determine your pickup location, calculate fares, and provide real-time ride tracking for navigation and safety.

plugins.photosPermission: Bro needs access to your photos to let you change your profile picture.
plugins.cameraPermission: Bro needs camera access to take your profile photo.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Bro uses your location to find nearby drivers, determine your pickup location, calculate fares, and provide real-time ride tracking for navigation and safety.
plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Bro uses your location to find nearby drivers, determine your pickup location, calculate fares, and provide real-time ride tracking for navigation and safety.
